Pre-Game Insights: Eight-time Ballon d'Or winner Lionel Messi will miss Argentina's final Group A fixture against Peru.
Assistant coach Walter Samuel confirmed that Messi will not be involved against Peru.
Manager Lionel Scaloni will serve a touchline ban and has confirmed that changes will be made to his starting lineup.
Those who did not feature in Argentina's first two group matches 'will play' against Peru.
